title: The Opposer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, everyone decides to oppose you or not. In order to win you must kill everyone who opposes you. Learn who opposes you.
- Depending on the amount of people that oppose you, become stronger.
>= 90%: Have Unstoppable attack, Invincible defence, your attack rampages and you use it twice.
>= 75%: Have Powerful attack and defense, your attack rampages
>= 50%: Have Powerful attack and defense
>= 25%: have basic attack and defense
>= 10%: have basic attack
\> 0%: have 1/2 basic attack (only kills if it hits someone twice. A player is notified on the first hit)
0%: You win and everyone else loses immediately.

desc:
Post 5143
*The NK's goal is "Kill all who would oppose you", right? But who will?*
